page.description: Save a string to a file
page.syntax: L save_to_file(C string ,C filename [,L append [,L silent ]])

argument.name: string
argument.description: The data to save into the file.

argument.name: filename
argument.description: The fully qualified name of a file.

argument.name: append
argument.description: Logical. Optional. Default = .F. (overwrite file) .T. = Append data. .F. = Overwrite existing data.

page.discussion: SAVE_TO_FILE() saves a character string to a file specified by filename. This high level command is easier than using the low level <FILE>.CREATE()and <FILE>.WRITE()methods.

section.title: Example
section.description: This script saves the contents of the variable, xx2 to a text file.
